Action.author: bh4rtp
Action.body: Keeping other steps unchanged except step 2), both invoke and query on peer2 will fail if using endorsement policy -P "AND ('Org0MSP.member', 'Org1MSP.member')".

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~AdnanChoudhury Could you assess this one? Can you reproduce? Do you have an explanation?
